Description: What else besides a mask can I wear to protect myself from catching corona from others?
DialogueText:
Patient:
What else besides a mask can I wear to protect myself from catching corona from others?
Doctor:
In brief:   Distance   Staying separated by 6 feet can make a difference!  The following guideline should help!https://www.  healthtap.com/blog/covid-19-care-guidelines/preventing-covid-19  Would you like to video or text chat with me?
